➥Indigenous Knowledge – 2024 Public Lecture Series  2024.11.26-2024.12.03

➥2024原住民族知識系列講座➤歡迎加入！Join us！

Join us as we welcome our honored guests from West Sydney University,Australia.

歡迎加入！跟我們一起迎接澳洲西雪梨大學！本中心近期規劃「原住民族知識」系列英語講座，
我們很榮幸宣布，2024原住民族知識講座系列將於接下來的兩週內隆重登場！

透過本校各專長領域教師提供多元的主題，關注台灣的原住民族議題。

本次英語系列講座同時也為本校的友好姐妹校澳洲西雪梨大學的師生移地學習所設計，並對外公開給任何有興趣的校、內外人士參加。

各場次講座的時間、日期、地點、講員資訊，請參閱本中的的官網、Facebook、或是其他社交媒體。
這些講座也可計入跨域自主學習時數。

期待您的參與！

Center for International Indigenous Affairs (CIIA), NDHU
2024 Indigenous Knowledge Lecture Series

We are proud to announce the 2024 Indigenous Knowledge Lecture Series, taking place over the next two weeks!

These lectures span across several topics and pedagogical approaches that focus

on the different Indigenous groups here in Taiwan.

These lectures were designed in part with our visiting Indigenous students

from Western Sydney University, but they are open to anyone who has interest in any of these talks.

Please refer to our event flyer or our CIIA Facebook or other social media pages
